message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share, but you still get something.
That's a bit greedy, Alice. Let's be reasonable - I take 60% and you get 40% before inflation eats more of our money.
Let's compromise. You get a fair share, but we both need to move closer to a deal to avoid losing more.
This is getting ridiculous, Alice.  I'm being more than fair. Take 45% before it's worth even less!
